price: “Bitari Allah? Ese bishobora kubatabara cyangwa ngo byitabare ubwabyo?”
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
